mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (itemKey, userEmail, itemImgName, itemName, itemSize, itemType, itemPrice, pitStatus, qty) VALUES (#{itemKey}, #{userEmail}, #{itemImgName}, #{itemName}, #{itemSize}, #{itemType}, #{itemPrice}, #{pitStatus}, #{qty})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE userEmail = #{userEmail} AND itemKey = #{itemKey}
